featured.text: The Swiss military purchasers considered the new model with a corkscrew for opening wine not “essential for survival,” so officers had to buy this new model by themselves.

definition.zh_def: 購買者，指購買商品或服務的人。
definition.en_def: A person or entity that buys goods or services.
definition.example: The purchaser decided to buy the new smartphone after reading the reviews.
